title: Love Island's Dom Lever gets a hair transplant just weeks after becoming a dad

Dom Lever has opened up about his hair transplant journey a few weeks after welcoming a baby with his wife Jess Shears.

The hunky dad, 28, told his Instagram followers that he's "always wanted a better hairline" and shared his transformation with a topless pic showing off his mega toned bod.

The two month process has left the former Love Island star in love with his new locks, and so he dedicated the jaw-dropping photo to the team at KSL clinics.

Grabbing his hair in the photo, the sexy star had his tattooed arms on full display, with nothing but a small towel barely clinging onto his waist.

Manchester-born Dom captioned his heart racing photo: "Two months ago I visited the team @ksl_clinics for a FUE hair transplant!

"I wasn’t receding or losing my hair but I’ve always wanted a better hairline."

(Image: Instagram)

He then signed off his post with a thank you to the company.

Fans of the star swooped in to leave comments about his good looks and new hair.

The couple who met on Love Island in 2017, soon tied the knot shortly after in a gorgeous wedding ceremony with close family and friends on the Greek island of Mykonos.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Supplied by WENN)

Dom and Jess have followed in the footsteps of power couple Olivia and Alex Bowen, who also met on the hit dating series.

And just after they wed, Jess announced they were expecting a baby together in a heartwarming Instagram post.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Rex)

"The best is yet to come," she teased with a photo of their baby scan in between a photo of Jess cradling her bump at the time, and Dom holding his stomach.

At the beginning of this month, the reality star, 27, confirmed the news of a healthy baby on Instagram.

(Image: mirror.co.uk)

She shared a snap of her bundle of joy's tiny feet and a glimpse of their face in a sweet post, writing: "Baby Lever."

The name and gender of the tot, who was overdue, and the date that Jess gave birth has yet to be revealed.
description: He gave an insight into dad life as he shared his hair transformation
